comment: She was very unhelpful when asked for feedback. I had emailed her because she asked me to reach out to her for feedback. She then proceeded to refuse to help me ever since. She insists you call her even if you are uncomfortable with the thought of calling your teachers personal phone number.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: The course is very straightforward; do what is posted and you'll be fine. Discussion posts weekly and open book quizzes as well: one big group project and a multiple-choice final. Discussions are graded heavily, but she is always willing to help with fantastic feedback. So many extra credit opportunities, you'll pass 100%. Take her!!

Generally the class is easy compared to other online course but the weekly discussion post are toughly graded and it's such a drag. Be prepared to wait every week to do discussion posts and submit them by specified time. Your best bet for any criticism or questions is over the phone she's very eh over email

Couldn't recommend a better professor for this course. Extremely caring and genuinely wants each student to reach success. I've never written a review here, but I wanted to express how great this course was.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She is wonderful!! So personal and really cares about her students, very sweet.
I've never had a teacher who cares so much about their students. Please take her. It's an easy A

pls pls pls pls pls take her. anyone who complains literally did not try one bit. she genuinely cares for all of her students and it shows. the class is easy, the reading is not complicated, and extra credit is provided. i promise if you just try and submit work on time, you'll do great. i would easily take her a second, third, and fourth time.

LOVE LOVE LOVE Prof Baldonado!! She is very interactive and offers extra credit & support throughout the semester. Prof B really wants all of her students to do well and is more than willing to work with you. 
We had a final paper, but no final. The grading is straightforward and she is very good at communicating consistently. TAKE HER!!!!!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Honestly one of the worst experiences that I have had in college. Don't take any classes with this teacher.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework
